mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (category_id, item_name, item_price, item_description, item_image_path, item_register_time) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemDescription}, #{itemImagePath}, NOW())
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE temp_table AS( SELECT category_id FROM category WHERE master_category_id = #{master_category_id} UNION ALL SELECT c.category_id FROM category AS c INNER jOIN temp_table ON c.master_category_id = temp_table.category_id ) SELECT item.item_id, category_id, item_name, item_price, item_description, item_image_path, item_register_time, SELL_TABLE.cnt FROM item LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM order_detail INNER JOIN cargo ON order_detail.cargo_id = cargo.cargo_id GROUP BY item_id ) as SELL_TABLE ON item.item_id = SELL_TABLE.item_id WHERE item.category_id IN (SELECT * FROM temp_table) ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT #{limit};
SELECT * FROM category WHERE category_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT master_category_id FROM category WHERE master_category_id IS NOT NULL)
